snippet: The lower house of Parliament passed a bill on Tuesday that would ban smoking in public places, a contentious measure in a country with one of the highest smoking rates in the world.
abstract: Russia's lower house of Parliament passes bill banning smoking in public places, contentious measure in country with one of world's highest smoking rates.
lead_paragraph: The lower house of Parliament passed a bill on Tuesday that would ban smoking in public places, a contentious measure in a country with one of the highest smoking rates in the world.

headline.main: Russia: Lower House Passes Public Smoking Ban
headline.print_headline: Russia: Lower House Passes Public Smoking Ban
